newsitem.title: USA: Empire of Carolina names William Craig CFO.
newsitem.headline: Empire of Carolina names William Craig CFO.

text.p: Empire of Carolina said Friday that William Craig replaced Jeffrey Currier as executive vice president and chief financial officer.
Currier has left the company to pursue other interests, Empire said.
Craig formerly was the principal of Wm Craig & Co., a financial services firm specializing in workouts and turnarounds.
Earlier this month the company reported its first quarter loss widened to $0.44 from $0.41 in the first quarter of 1996.
Empire of Carolina designs, develops, manufactures and markets basic plastic children's toys.
